text_logic_form: The measure of angle $QLM$ is $2x^2 - 10$ degrees.
The measure of angle $QPM$ is $8x$ degrees.
The length of the line $MP$ is $10$.
Find the perimeter of the quadrilateral $LMPQ$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The measure of angle $QLM$ is $2x^2 - 10$ degrees.
The measure of angle $QPM$ is $8x$ degrees.
The length of the line $MP$ is $10$.
Find the perimeter of the quadrilateral $LMPQ$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $PM$ is $10$.
The point $R$ lies on the line $QM$.
The point $R$ lies on the line $LP$.
line_instances: There are lines $QL$, $QP$, $QM$, and $QR$, forming the rhombus $LMPQ$.
There are lines $LP$, $LM$, and $LR$, forming the rhombus $LMQR$.
There are lines $PM$, $PR$, and $MR$, forming the rhombus $MPQR$.
